Add flextable minibar to column

Source: R/format-report.R
add_score_minibar.Rd

Add flextable minibar to column

add_score_minibar(
  flextable_df,
  score_col = "Weighted Score",
  risk_col = "Risk",
  column_index = NULL,
  color_text = FALSE,
  digits = 2
)

Arguments

flextable_df

a flextable object

score_col

The name of the column specifying the scores. Used to calculate

risk_col

The name of the column specifying the risks

column_index

Index of column to apply the minibar to. Traditionally, this should map to the index of score_col, but doesn't need to. If NULL, will map to the index of score_col.

color_text

Logical (T/F). If FALSE color the text in column_index black. Otherwise use risk colors (green, orange, red)

digits

number of digits to round scores to.

Details

a minibar will replace the entire column of whichever specified (via column_index). In other words, it doesn't append the minibar to a column. Specifying an index that doesn't correspond to the weighted scores, would overwrite that column.

digits must be specified, because the default behavior is rounding the column to one decimal

Contents

Developed by Kyle Barrett, Seth Green, Kyle Meyer.
